_description: Monster Evolution System configuration - level-based, tool-based, and Soul Shard evolutions

001_sparkle.description: Sparkle evolves into Voltix at level 16

002_voltix.description: Voltix evolves into Thunderlord at level 36

010_ember.description: Ember evolves into Flare at level 18

011_flare.description: Flare evolves into Inferno at level 38

020_bubble.description: Bubble evolves into Aqua at level 16

021_aqua.description: Aqua evolves into Tsunami at level 36

030_leaf.description: Leaf evolves into Vine at level 17

031_vine.description: Vine evolves into Forest Guardian at level 35

040_stone.description: Stone evolves into Boulder at level 20

041_boulder.description: Boulder evolves into Mountain at level 40

001_sparkle.description: Sparkle + Thunder Stone = Lightning King (alternate evolution)

010_ember.description: Ember + Fire Stone = Flame Emperor (alternate evolution)

020_bubble.description: Bubble + Water Stone = Ocean Lord (alternate evolution)

030_leaf.description: Leaf + Leaf Stone = Nature Spirit (alternate evolution)

boss_thunder.description: Thunder Boss Soul Shard - grants powerful temporary form for 3 battles

boss_inferno.description: Inferno Boss Soul Shard - grants blazing temporary form for 3 battles

boss_ocean.description: Ocean Boss Soul Shard - grants aquatic temporary form for 3 battles

boss_nature.description: Nature Boss Soul Shard - grants verdant temporary form for 3 battles

boss_titan.description: Titan Boss Soul Shard - grants colossal temporary form for 3 battles

boss_void.description: Void Boss Soul Shard - grants shadowy temporary form for 4 battles (rare)

boss_celestial.description: Celestial Boss Soul Shard - grants divine temporary form for 4 battles (rare)

boss_ancient.description: Ancient Boss Soul Shard - grants legendary temporary form for 5 battles (legendary)

hybrid_stat_growth.description: Stat growth influenced by S19 Dual XP ratios (combat vs knowledge)

combat_stat_scaling.description: Combat XP ratio increases physical stats by up to 50%

knowledge_stat_scaling.description: Knowledge XP ratio increases special/magical stats by up to 50%

balanced_bonus.description: Balanced playstyle (50/50 ratio) grants 10% bonus to all stats

level_based.description: Check after every battle when monster gains XP

tool_based.description: Requires both monster and tool item in inventory

soul_shard.description: Temporary transformation that reverts after specified battles

balance_notes.tool_evolutions: Alternate evolution paths with different stat distributions
balance_notes.soul_shards: Powerful temporary buffs, limited duration prevents abuse
balance_notes.hybrid_stats: Rewards specialized playstyles while not punishing balanced play
